content.rendered:
The new Walls of Books store owner has just recently decided where she will open. It’s in a quaint, well-designed 1,500 sf shop on a downtown street. It has wood floors, and it’s been maintained well. It has large windows in the front and ample parking all around. Some of the neighboring businesses have been around for more than twenty years. It’s a great spot for a used bookstore.

The owner has done all the research, and she is enjoying the process. She is able to be more relaxed through the whole situation because she has our guidance as backup. It’s amazing that our experience and knowledge is being used to help other people open used bookstores. Our goal is that Walls of Books creates many successful entrepreneurs.
